DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety and efficacy of the patients with MR4 therapy in GVHD prophylaxis study who are eligible for the administration after 100 days post transplant (up to 1 year)
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of a Tacrolimus New Oral Formulation (MR4) in BMT Patients-Extension-
DOC.criteria: Patient had enrolled in GVHD prophylaxis study. Patient had been fully informed. The patient had been not eligible for the administration after 100 days post transplant in the investigator's judgement.
